text.section: An order of suspension or revocation is effective, in accordance with its terms and conditions, as soon as the Board files it under this title.
On suspension or revocation of any license, the holder shall surrender the license certificate to the Board.
At the end of the suspension period, the Board shall return to the licensee any license certificate surrendered under this section.
The Board shall keep a copy of the order of suspension or revocation as a permanent record.
